description: Anime cast give commentary on various photographs showing places connected to the show.

titles.title: Photograph Commentary: "Takeharanzu" in "Tamayura Days ~Welcome to Our Warm Town~"
Shashin Commentary: "Takeharanzu" in "Tamayura no Hi ~Youkoso Atatakana Machi e~"
写真コメンタリー「たけはらんず」in「たまゆらの日 ~ようこそあたたかな町へ~」
